channel.title: [PI] EntityDef.java Help please

item.title: [PI] EntityDef.java Help please
item.dc:creator: @Snackman Snackman
item.description:
@Snackman wrote:

Ok, I followed This guide.

I end up getting these errors:

Java\EntityDef.java:66: cannot find symbol symbol : variable originalModelColors location: class EntityDef entitydef.originalModelColors = new int[changedColors]; ^ Java\EntityDef.java:67: cannot find symbol symbol : variable modifiedModelColors location: class EntityDef entitydef.modifiedModelColors = new int[changedColors]; ^ Java\EntityDef.java:68: cannot find symbol symbol : variable originalModelColors location: class EntityDef entitydef.originalModelColors[0] = 40; // Original model color ^ Java\EntityDef.java:69: cannot find symbol symbol : variable modifiedModelColors location: class EntityDef entitydef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 34; // Changed model color ^ Java\EntityDef.java:70: cannot find symbol symbol : variable models location: class EntityDef entitydef.models = new int[9]; ^ Java\EntityDef.java:71: cannot find symbol symbol : variable models location: class EntityDef entitydef.models[0] = 9638;//Npc's Cape ^ Java\EntityDef.java:72: cannot find symbol symbol : variable models location: class EntityDef entitydef.models[1] = 205;//Npc's Head ^ Java\EntityDef.java:73: cannot find symbol symbol : variable models location: class EntityDef entitydef.models[2] = 40207;//Npc's Plate ^ Java\EntityDef.java:74: cannot find symbol symbol : variable models location: class EntityDef entitydef.models[3] = 5024;//Npc's Legs ^ Java\EntityDef.java:75: cannot find symbol symbol : variable models location: class EntityDef entitydef.models[4] = 43660;//Npc's Weapon ^ Java\EntityDef.java:76: cannot find symbol symbol : variable models location: class EntityDef entitydef.models[5] = 13319;//Npc's Gloves ^ Java\EntityDef.java:77: cannot find symbol symbol : variable models location: class EntityDef entitydef.models[6] = 10683;//Npc's Boots ^ Java\EntityDef.java:78: cannot find symbol symbol : variable models location: class EntityDef entitydef.models[7] = 17461;//Npc's Darkness(Shadow) ^ Java\EntityDef.java:79: cannot find symbol symbol : variable models location: class EntityDef entitydef.models[8] = 20147;//Npc's Arms(You Dont Have To Edit) ^ Java\EntityDef.java:80: cannot find symbol symbol : variable standAnim location: class EntityDef entitydef.standAnim = 6001;// Npc's Stand Emote ^ Note: Java\client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 15 errors Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

Please help me

This is the part of my Entitydef.java which is supposed to handle the custom npcs:

[CODE] public static EntityDef forID(int i)
{
for(int j = 0; j < 20; j++)
{
if(cache[j].interfaceType == (long)i)
{
return cache[j];
}
}

    anInt56 = (anInt56 + 1) % 20;
    EntityDef entitydef = cache[anInt56] = new EntityDef();
    stream.currentOffset = streamIndices[i];
    entitydef.interfaceType = i;
    entitydef.readValues(stream);

if(i == 8295) {
stream.currentOffset = streamIndices[630]; 
entitydef.aByte68 = 3;
entitydef.readValues(stream); // Collect original NPC data
entitydef.itemActions = new String[6];
entitydef.itemActions[1] = "Attack";
    int changedColors = 1; // Number of model colors changed on the NPC
    entitydef.originalModelColors = new int[changedColors];
    entitydef.modifiedModelColors = new int[changedColors];
    entitydef.originalModelColors[0] = 40; // Original model color
    entitydef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 34; // Changed model color
entitydef.models = new int[9];
entitydef.models[0] = 9638;//Npc's Cape
entitydef.models[1] = 205;//Npc's Head
entitydef.models[2] = 40207;//Npc's Plate
entitydef.models[3] = 5024;//Npc's Legs
entitydef.models[4] = 43660;//Npc's Weapon
entitydef.models[5] = 13319;//Npc's Gloves
entitydef.models[6] = 10683;//Npc's Boots
entitydef.models[7] = 17461;//Npc's Darkness(Shadow)
entitydef.models[8] = 20147;//Npc's Arms(You Dont Have To Edit)
entitydef.standAnim = 6001;// Npc's Stand Emote
entitydef.name = "NPC name";
entitydef.combatLevel = 175;//Combat Level
entitydef.description = "Examine".getBytes();
}

    return entitydef;
}[/CODE]

Thanks in advance,
snackman.

(yes I am ReflexNL on R-S, so don’t say I copy-pasted a HELP THREAD!)
